reviews.review_msg: I never felt as like I belonged in the class as much as I did in her class throughout any of my semesters at SFU. Her engagement and helpfulness made the course incredibly fun. Her energy is always positive.  The guidebook project was one of the most memorable projects in my SFU life. You will never get bored with her course.

Pretty good professor when it came to feedback and engagement. The structure of the class itself wasn't amazing, but I'm pretty sure that's not in her control. As long as you have access to the Genki I textbook and workbook, you can get 90% of the course of what the course offers if you self study.
